688866511552905228.story: **My name is Ridgael jackson, I am 24 years old and I was recording** a music video clip on my motorcycle with the jacket that michael jackson gave me when suddenly I heard a great sound and everything went dark and with flames. I lost my brothers and my parents in the city and my mission is to meet with them to see that they are well. I know that I will find them

655875670278144031.story: **My rotten was a fierce stay at home wanna be wrestler,** whose big dreams were to be the best wrestler in RottenVille. He kept practicing and trying, but he wasn't good enough, so no one gave him a chance... Then, came the explosion and something awoke inside of him. He is now stronger than ever, and he is in the business of kicking ass, and let me tell ya, business is booming.

786581213430546452.story: **A year ago just before 8 a.m. in the 420 block of Rot Street.** As officers arrived, they discovered that two Rottens had been shot at least 6 time each. The Victim rotten was found at the scene shooting back and the other was found in a vehicle a short distance away. Both were taken both taken into custody. However they have escaped after the blast destroyed the prison they are mortal enemyâ€™s we have reason to believe they are out for revenge. Be cautious they are dangerous.
